original_title: 羞恥！思春期発育状況検査会2～未成年女子学生・第二次性徴の測定と性交実態調査～
overview: One day, I was suddenly gathered in the meeting room and told by the teacher, "I will inspect the growth status of you who have reached secondary sexual characteristics." There were many scary uncles sitting there and told to take off their uniforms and pants in front of them. Every corner of the body was investigated one after another, such as odor measurement. I was blamed for relentless questions, and when I found out that I was a virgin, I was made to hold a big male genitalia, and I just slipped into my vaginal opening ...
title: Embarrassment! The Association That Examines The Circumstances Of A Barely Legals Physical Development 2 – Barely Legal Schoolgirls Measuring Their Secondary Sex Characteristics And Surveying The True State Of Sexual Intercourse –
